cast.overview: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music, marijuana, and easy sex, feels his life is boring and despairing. But in the course of a single day he unknowingly captures a death on film.
cast.title: Blow-Up

details.biography:
Christopher Walenty Dreja (born 11 November 1945) is an English retired musician and photographer, best known as the rhythm guitarist and bassist for rock band the Yardbirds for which he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1992.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Chris Dreja, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Chris Dreja
